Text: South Bergish (German: "Südbergische Dialekte ") or Upper Bergish (German: "Oberbergische Dialekte ") is a group of German dialects of the Bergisches Land Region East of the Rhine and approximately south of the Wupper and north of the Sieg.
Triplets:<South Bergish

Text: South Bergish:  These dialects are part of the Ripuarian group and thus are also called East Ripuarian.
